title: Episode 291: Lizzo
description: “Still Bad” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Lizzo is a Grammy- and Emmy-winning singer, rapper, songwriter, and actress. She’s been putting out music since 2013, and her last two albums both went platinum. Her fifth album, Love In Real Life, comes out this summer. title: 60 Million People Used AI to "Create" Music in 2024
description: According to the latest IMS Business Report, 10% of consumers crossed the line from listeners to creators last year, underscoring a fundamental shift in how humans interact with music.

title: Green Day to Receive Star on the Hollywood Walk Of Fame
